name: Manan Negi
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: Highly Motivated B.Tech Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in front-end development with experience in building user-friendly web applications using React. Looking to contribute my expertise in UI/UX design and performance optimization to create exceptional user experiences.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Zinx: An e-commerce Website
projects.description: Created a comprehensive e-commerce website using React, incorporating features such as product listings, shopping cart functionality, and user authentication. Integrated payment processing and order management with a backend API. Designed a responsive and intuitive interface to enhance the shopping experience across all devices.

projects.name: InFoods-A Food Delivery Application
projects.description: Developed a food delivery application that allows users to browse, order, and track food from local restaurants. Implemented features like real-time order tracking, restaurant search, and user-friendly interfaces. Utilized React for the frontend, integrated APIs for seamless delivery logistics, and ensured responsive design for both mobile and web platforms.

projects.name: MovieDesk
projects.description: Created a movie search application where users can look up their favorite films and view detailed descriptions and ratings. Designed with a straightforward interface using React, ensuring an efficient search experience and easy access to movie information, though streaming capabilities are not included.

experiences.description: Worked on a simple Video Conferencing Website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Used libraries like SimpleWebRTC, PeerJS, or build your own signaling server with Node.js and Socket.io.

full_output.name: Manan Negi
